TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AutoLine extends DocumentFormat.OpenXml.OpenXmlLeafTextElement

Docs.summary: AutoLine. When the object is serialized out as xml, its qualified name is xvml:AutoLine.

remarks.format:
## Remarks [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlnoticeiso.md)]
**AutoLine (AutoLine)**
This element specifies that the object’s line properties are automatically provided by the application and are not overridden with a specific line color, style, or width. [*Rationale*: An application can choose to display objects with certain visual properties that are appropriate to the application environment. *end rationale*] If this element is specified without a value, it is assumed to be *true*. This is a general-use element.
[*Example*:
```xml <x:ClientData> … <x:AutoLine>False</x:AutoLine > </x:ClientData> ```
*end example*]
The possible values for this element are defined by the *ST_TrueFalseBlank* simple type (§15.1.2.6).
|Parent Elements| |---------------------| |ClientData (§14.4.2.12)|
[*Note*: The W3C XML Schema definition of this element’s content model (ST_TrueFalseBlank) is located in §A.7.9. *end note*]
[!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlcopyrightiso.md)]
